DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine whether induce labor one dose misoprostol , follow treatment oxytocin , still effective enough increase chance successful vaginal delivery compare use one dose misoprostol , follow treatment oxytocin .
DOC.brief_title: Is More Than One Dose Misoprostol Needed Expedite Vaginal Delivery Patient With Unripe Cervix ?
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve comparison two different regimen prostaglandin use `` cervical ripening '' prior induction labor . Women admit hospital induction labor find `` unripe '' cervix time admission , agree participate study randomly assign one two treatment group . In one group , single dose 25 µcg misoprostol administer vaginally four hour later oxytocin induction start clinically indicate . In second group woman , repeat dos misoprostol give every four hour six dos unless labor cervical ripening occur sooner . At point , oxytocin start need . Success vaginal delivery 24 hour , time initiation protocol delivery cesarean section rate compare . Complications postpartum hemorrhage , episodes tachysystole fetal compromise chorioamnionitis endometritis monitor .
DOC.criteria: Any pregnant woman undergo induction labor Live singleton pregnancy ≥ 37 week gestation Bishop score < 6 Category I fetal heart rate Contraindications vaginal delivery ( e.g . vas previa , placenta prevue , nonvertex presentation , umbilical cord prolapse , active genital herpes infection . ) Pregnancies complicate major fetal anomaly Any contraindication use misoprostol , include History previous csection major uterine surgery Prior allergic reaction Category II III fetal heart rate Regular uterine contraction ≥ 3 10minute period persistent least 30 minute Estimated fetal weight < 10 percentile Premature rupture membrane Age < 18 year old Women capacity consent
